issues.description: Logic error: canNavigateToPreviousPage() incorrectly calls this.flow.canNavigateToNextPage() instead of this.flow.canNavigateToPreviousPage()
Type mismatch: PaginatedFlow.scrollIntoView() doesn't accept the options parameter defined in the Flow interface, which could cause unexpected behavior when options are passed
Potential regression: Default flow mode changed from 'scrolled' to 'paginated' with a '// TEMP' comment, suggesting an unintended change
Resource leak: PaginatedFlow.destroy() removes touch event listeners but doesn't remove the keydown event listener added in the constructor
Potential bug: ScrolledFlow.scrollIntoView() uses scrollBy with left:x which may cause horizontal scrolling when only vertical scrolling is intended
Incomplete implementation: PaginatedFlow.scrollIntoView() doesn't handle all the options that ScrolledFlow.scrollIntoView() does, potentially causing inconsistent behavior
